_comment_azure_token: Get your PAT from https://dev.azure.com/ → Security → Personal Access Tokens with 'Build (read)' and 'Artifact (read)' scopes
_comment_usage: Use with: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type azure --src org/project#build_id --config azure-config.json

_example_commands.mirror_to_cache: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type azure --src conda-forge/feedstock-builds#1374331 --tgt-type cache --config azure-config.json
_example_commands.mirror_to_local: meso-forge-mirror mirror --src-type azure --src conda-forge/feedstock-builds#1374331 --tgt-type local --tgt ./conda-repo --config azure-config.json
